name: Casa di Iginia e Paolo Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: This is the best B&B I have ever stayed in - it was immaculately clean and very comfortable, the owner was helpful, welcoming and friendly and the location was perfect. Fantastic value for money and I wouldn't hesitate in recommending staying here to anyone at all - not just young budget travellers either.
reviews.title: Spotless, ideally located, perfect little B&B

aka: Casa Di Iginia e Paolo Hotel
description: If you are looking for a clean, comfortable room to rent in central Rome, to sleep near via Veneto and Villa Borghese, with everything you need for a pleasant stay in Rome, Casa di Iginia e Paolo is just for you.We have well-lighted, large rooms and the entire house has wi-fi access. Breakfast is included in the price...
